# Project Instructions

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions (None needed)
- [x] Compile the Project (Static site, no compilation needed)
- [x] Create and Run Task (Not needed for static site)
- [x] Launch the Project (Open index.html in browser)
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Overview

Simple, modern, single-page portfolio website for Akash Singh.
Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Contains sections for Education, Experience, Projects, Skills, and Achievements.
